Articles.Content: This is like a no brainer. I am not sure why it isn't in the stock game. The big landing gears are great for heavy crafts, but when I use Tweakscale to make them equal size, it doesn't add up.

Try TweakScale 2.5 Beta. It scales wheels correctly.

Being beta, there's a lot of things still being tested, so there's a chance that something can break your instalment.

But this is what I use on all my instalments, even "production" ones, so for at least for the AddOns I use, it's working fine.

(But make backups of everything just in case)

On 2/15/2020 at 8:40 PM, I likeOxidizerrfuel said:

This is like a no brainer. I am not sure why it isn't in the stock game. The big landing gears are great for heavy crafts, but when I use Tweakscale to make them equal size, it doesn't add up. 

I agree, but my problem is, how many wheels will it have?

They should really just make steerable versions of current big gears.

 

One workaround is to use servos to make ANY landing gear steerable. Although there are serious problems with stability.
